origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'SocialSecurityAPI.get_investment_operations', 'description': 'This function provides information on the investment operations of social insurance funds for a specified year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'fundType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of social insurance fund, e.g., social_insurance.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which investment operations information is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'investmentDetails', 'description': 'Details of the investment operations for the specified social insurance fund and year.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 SocialSecurityAPI.get_investment_operations, 它的参数输入如下: 'fundType'是'social_insurance', 'year'是'2023'.
